attributes.title: No ❤️
attributes.review: This app took 69 days to download even tho I have PERFECT wifi. When it finally downloaded my dogs started handshaking and repeatedly said something is a demonic voice 👹. I DO NOT recommend.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: It took me a while to get the app, and once I got the app it crashes within 2 seconds, I would not recommend this to anyone.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!!!
attributes.review: this app is just so bad. made my phone have 114 VIRUSES!!! do not install this app it will get everything hacked and you WILL lose all your pictures and everything on your phone.😱😰😓 #savebarron

attributes.title: how dare they!?!!?!?!?!!
attributes.review: this app is the worst app i have ever seen! and trust me i’ve seen a lot of apps in my life. this app set off an alarm and i lost hearing in my left ear!!!! the alarm went off as soon as i opened it. when i went to the doctor to see what was wrong they told me that this app’s alarm gave me cancer, i have the best doctor in my state because i am very rich so i’m positive that what she said was true!!!!!

attributes.title: Bad🤮
attributes.review: This app is bad like when I open the app my phone was saying error like something bad happens when you used this please listen to me don’t use this app

attributes.title: Terrible app🧚🏼
attributes.review: It took three whole days to download and crashed every time I tried to log my info onto the app. Would not recommend!!!

attributes.title: The least helpful app I’ve ever had!
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app my phone overheated and caused a swarm of ants to sprint under my door. They carried my dog to they’re queen and now we are being held captive in their ant colony. Thanks a lot. 😡😡🤬🤬

attributes.title: black lives matter biatch
attributes.review: the app took longer than a week to download which is absolutely absurd. 2nd off it has played an excruciatingly annoying sound which has brought out a bunch of the orange cheeto boy supporters. this app needs to be taken down because it is absolutely terrible. it also caused my fish to have a seizure and die. take it down or i will tell corporate.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Took weeks to download and overall sucked didn’t do anything good for me and a waste of my phone space. Not only did it take a ton of gigabytes but it DRAINED MY BATTERY. Please don’t download the app

attributes.title: Glitch
attributes.review: This app has so many bugs and is extremely glitchy. I would not download this app at all. If I could give zero stars I would.
